synopsis.text: S-class Summoner Kelvin awakens in a mysterious realm, having relinquished his past memories in exchange for unparalleled abilities. Accompanied by the captivating goddess Melfina, who facilitated his rebirth, Kelvin embarks on an electrifying journey as an adventurer. As they traverse through this uncharted world, Kelvin's innate love for battle emerges, leading him to confront fearsome adversaries like the Black Knight of the Ancient Castle of Evil Spirits and the demon residing within the Hidden Cave of the Sage. With Melfina by his side, Kelvin's extraordinary talents and thirst for combat propel him towards legendary status in this epic saga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
